episodes.title: Bankrupt Tennis Coach becomes Cult Leader | Universal Medicine
episodes.description:
Renowned Charlatan Serge Benhayon ran government funded lectures in the early 2000s, indoctrinating thousands into his beliefs. In this video I delve into Serge's story and the many controversies regarding his group Universal Medicine. 

This took ages to make (a like and sub would really be appreciated) 

Music: 

Caravan - https://youtu.be/38CRu1rCaKg?si=850YIyyiSFhpq5Tu

Shangri-La (Electric light orchestra) - https://youtu.be/gRZnw6GPe8o?si=Tvxrk8qTwOsLVvXV

The inside waltz (Bo Burnham) - https://youtu.be/ODJsi5CMj7U?si=qhd0_8UVjbhjdScz

A Shadow's Lament  - https://youtu.be/doc00tCkhOo?si=uIA1uVzlvNhHyyTJ

Exit Music for a film (Radiohead) Instrumental - https://youtu.be/Ep2tKRGG7Kg?si=sKtadZNf2H6hdYuc

Mulligans theme (Noah Helle) - https://youtu.be/sjNwwMva-eU?si=JiuWOk5n3pH9WLt1

Plage Coquillage (First Kiss Song) - https://youtu.be/F6nJgZOt9uo?si=dLRzLKZdeCV2Oxii

Chapters:
0:00 Introduction 
2:09 Origins
5:13 Controversy 
9:20 Judith Mcintyre
16:20 Remnants of Universal Medicine

Universal Medicine Cult, Belle general cult, Ballina cult, Byron Bay Cult, Serge Benhayon, Esther Rockett, Universal Medicine Court case, Australian Cult
